plays.notes: A rare tie between Trystan and Rachel.
Mark's "buy the cheepest property" strategy didn't work for him but Rachel managed to win by 1.
A close game where Rachel and Jess won at the last minute with a negotiation.

data.title: Trystan plays alone

plays.notes: Trystan lost his first game vs 2 ai opponents.
Trystan won his second game vs 2 ai opponents with a strong Novel World trade strategy.
Trystan just barely won vs 2 ai players by focusing on cities, forests, and space projects because of all the free titanium.
Trystan somehow defeated an another player using a premade red/white deck with strange equiment synergies.

data.notes: December is busy and no one was able to make it to today's boardgame day. Rachel and Trystan had to drink all the USS Richmond punch on their own.
